thread.title: John Mayer Seeks To Write More Hits, Not Be Racist

author: Stereogum
title: John Mayer Seeks To Write More Hits, Not Be Racist
text: Back in 2010, John Mayer was a popular recording artist. And then he gave an interview to Playboy in which he dropped an N-bomb and referred to Jessica Simpson as "sexual napalm." After that, he pretty much stopped being a popular recording artist. Mayer has spent the years since doing things like touring with most … More »
